modShortDescription: Eric's Goods is a 7 Days to Die mod that replace the vanilla game Eric's Stuff with Eric's Goods to add challenge, quest, and loot to the otherwise cute but very boring POI.
modDescription:
Eric’s Goods is a 7 Days to Die mod that replace the vanilla game Eric’s Stuff (oldwest\_business\_07 POI) with Eric’s Goods to add challenge, [quest](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-quests/), and loot to the otherwise cute but very boring [POI](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-prefab/).

## Changelog

**v1.1**

Make it work with Alpha 19

**v1.0**

* First official release of Eric’s Goods POI
* Replace Fun Pimps Eric’s Stuff with a more “fun” Eric’s Goods

**Important Note:** For this mod to work properly, it needs to be installed on both the server and every player’s computer.

**[Download](https://github.com/Laotseu/7dtdMods/releases/download/EricsGoods_v1.1/EricsGoods_v1.1.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19462-motorcyclealterations-v10-alpha-18/).

**Credits:** [Eric Beaudoin](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/eric-beaudoin/)
